channel.title: Adding Pk BoX?
channel.description:
Hmm im coding a server and i need more pk places so im wondering if anyone could teach me how to make/add a pk box in my server!
If u could i would be glad and happy!

item.title: Adding Pk BoX?
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

Numbers are wrong , coords first then object Id. And also compile

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Pk BoX?
item.dc:creator: @pkerA pkerA
item.description:
@pkerA wrote:

[quote=“Fatal Desire, post:2, topic:323910”]1. You will need to make a teleport to the pkbox.
2. You will need object to make the pkbox.
3. You will need to make it a non safe zone.

Which all can be found in tutorial section, using search bar, or using google.com

Not to be harsh.[/quote]

Okey how do i make somehting non wild?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Pk BoX?
item.dc:creator: @Fatal_Desire Fatal Desire
item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

You sure you got all the numbers right? and didnt put id in place where coord should be?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Pk BoX?
item.dc:creator: @pkerA pkerA
item.description:
@pkerA wrote:

Fatal Desire:

No with non safe i mean…If the place you want is a safezone u need to make it wild zone.

Okey how do i add objects?

I maked this

	       makeGlobalObject(2345, 3349, 3244, -1, 10);
	       makeGlobalObject(2345, 3349, 3245, -1, 10);
	       makeGlobalObject(2345, 3349, 3246, -1, 10);
	       makeGlobalObject(2345, 3349, 3247, -1, 10);
	       makeGlobalObject(2345, 3349, 3248, -1, 10);
	       makeGlobalObject(2345, 3349, 3249, -1, 10);
	       makeGlobalObject(2345, 3349, 3253, -1, 10);
	       makeGlobalObject(2345, 3349, 3254, -1, 10);
	       makeGlobalObject(2345, 3349, 3255, -1, 10);
	       makeGlobalObject(2345, 3349, 3256, -1, 10);
	       makeGlobalObject(2345, 3349, 3257, -1, 10);
	       makeGlobalObject(2345, 3349, 3258, -1, 10);
	       makeGlobalObject(2213, 3357, 3250, 1, 10);
	       makeGlobalObject(2345, 3357, 3252, 0, 10);

And i added it but it didnt come up any objects??

Read full topic
